This is for US of A = NTSC/U. You'll have to find a Japanese version yourself, I have no clue. Good luck!

@frozt21

The retail box of this game has 3 discs, third disc is multiplayer stuff. Single player needs first two discs. So, of course, if you want to go through the entire single-player game, you would burn 2 discs. But maybe you burn 1 disc first, and if you start playing you'll find that the game is not worth it and then you wouldn't need to burn the second disc, right? =)

FFS SEED! Been stuck at 99% for 5 hours!

FAKE! (OR MODIFIED)!

This ISO is BASED on the marvel release. The DVD2FIX patch for the missing replay data was needed.  After patch applied, ABGX ERRORS.

ABGX 1.0.6
--------------
Game Partition CRC does not match the verified INI!

Either BAD RIP, or INTENTIONALLY modified.  DO NOT USE UNLESS YOU WANT THAT CONSOLE BANNED FROM XBOX LIVE.

Sorry for the bad news, btw.  I waited days downloading these discs and I encourage each of you with finished copies to run them through ABGX 1.0.6 also.  

Very disappointing.  I agree.
